snippet: Newly installed Wolfsburg head coach Daniel Bauer. (Photo by Alex Grimm/Getty Images) December 20, 2025 · 2 · VfL Wolfsburg interim head coach Daniel Bauer has received a permanent appointment.

title: Wolfsburg name Daniel Bauer permanent head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: A former central midfielder whose highest level was Bundesliga 2, Bauer will begin the course to gain his professional coaching licence with the DFB in January, alongside his work as head coach. Wolfsburg’s first game of the new year is away at Bayern Munich on 11 January. ... Bayern are missing at least three key players ahead of their final game of the year at Heidenheim.20.12.2025

title: VfL Wolfsburg - Wikipedia
snippet: On 24 May 2022, Niko Kovač was appointed as Wolfsburg's new head coach, with a contract lasting until June 2025, prematurely terminated in March 2024. Wolfsburg plays at the Volkswagen Arena, a multi-purpose stadium which seats a total capacity of 30,000 spectators.

title: Daniel Bauer becomes forty-first head coach in VfL Wolfsburg history - Yahoo Sports
snippet: Sat, December 20, 2025 at 3:01 p.m. UTC· ... Daniel Bauer is now the forty-first head coach in the history of VfL Wolfsburg, signing a contract with the Niedersachsen club until 30 June 2027.
